metadata.title: CVE-2019-8936 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: NTP through 4.2.8p12 has a NULL Pointer Dereference. It was discovered that the fix for CVE-2018-7182 introduced a NULL pointer dereference into NTP. An attacker could use this vulnerability to cause a denial of service (crash).

notes.note: leosilva> issue was introduced with the fix from CVE-2018-7182

criterions.comment: ntp package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:4.2.8p12+dfsg-3ubuntu4.1').
